mapper.select:
SELECT RENEW_DT , DUSTC , SDC , CMC , OZONEC , NDC
FROM BM_ATMO_INFO GROUP BY RENEW_DT DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT DL.DL_CD_NM AS SKY_COND , WI.TEMPC , WI.TEMP_MINI , WI.TEMP_HIGH , WI.HUMI , WI.RAIN_PRO , WI.RAINFALL , WI.NOTI_DT , WI.RENEW_DT FROM BM_WEAT_INFO WI LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON WI.SKY_COND = DL.DL_CD ORDER BY RENEW_DT DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT WE.NOTI_DT , DL.DL_CD_NM AS SKY_COND , WE.TEMPC , WE.TEMP_MINI , WE.TEMP_HIGH , WE.HUMI , WE.RAIN_PRO , WE.RAINFALL , WE.RENEW_DT FROM BM_WEAT_INFO WE LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON WE.SKY_COND = DL.DL_CD
SUBSTRING_INDEX(WE.RENEW_DT,"-",2) = #{filter}

SELECT MEAS_DT , DUSTC , SDC , CMC , OZONEC , NDC , RENEW_DT FROM BM_ATMO_INFO
SUBSTRING_INDEX(RENEW_DT,"-",2) = #{filter}

SELECT V.VHC_ID , V.VHC_NO , LIV.PROCE_RST , LIV.SEND_DATE FROM BM_LIVING_LOG LIV LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DV ON LIV.DVC_ID = DV.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON DV.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID
VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')

SELECT NUM_VAL4 , NUM_VAL5 , NUM_VAL6 , B.REMARK AS WEATAPIKEY , C.REMARK AS REMARKATMO , D.REMARK AS REMARKWEAT , F.REMARK AS ATMOAPIKEY FROM (SELECT CO_CD , NUM_VAL4 , NUM_VAL5 , NUM_VAL6
FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE DL_CD = "CD038") AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT REMARK , CO_CD FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE DL_CD = "CD040") AS B ON A.CO_CD = B.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT REMARK , CO_CD FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE DL_CD = "CD041" ) AS C ON A.CO_CD = C.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT REMARK , CO_CD FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE DL_CD = "CD039" ) AS D ON A.CO_CD = D.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT REMARK , CO_CD FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE DL_CD = "CD042" ) AS F ON A.CO_CD = F.CO_CD
mapper.update: UPDATE SM_DL_CD_INFO SET REMARK = #{remarkWeat} WHERE DL_CD = "CD039"
UPDATE SM_DL_CD_INFO SET REMARK = #{remarkAtmo} WHERE DL_CD = "CD041"
UPDATE SM_DL_CD_INFO SET REMARK = #{weatApiKey} WHERE DL_CD = "CD040"
UPDATE SM_DL_CD_INFO SET REMARK = #{atmoApiKey} WHERE DL_CD = "CD042"
